This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=GEO-GIG.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-06-23T08:28:38Z Nurdane Ilbeyli 2014-06-23T01:01:19-07:00 2014-06-23T01:01:19-07:00 International Conference on Ore Potential of Alkaline, Kimberlite and Carbonatite Magmatism https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=GEO-GIG;27891b64.1406 Dear Colleagues, We are pleased to invite you to participate in the\ufffd\ufffd30th International Conference on Ore Potential of Alkaline, Kimberlite and Carbonatite Magmatism\ufffd\ufffdthat will be held in\ufffd\ufffdAntalya (TURKEY)\ufffd\ufffdfrom\ufffd\ufffd29 September - 2 October 2014.\ufffd\ufffd The conference will take place at\ufffd\ufffdthe Harrington Park Resort Hotel\ufffd\ufffd(www.harringtonparkresort.com), Antalya, Turkey. For booking of your accommodation, please kindly visit the conference website for the best prices(www.alkaline2014.com). Online registration and abstract submission are still open until 30/06/2014. Please visit the conference website\ufffd\ufffdhttp://www.alkaline2014.com\ufffd\ufffdfor updates, important deadlines and abstract submission. For this conference, topics\ufffd\ufffdinclude genesis of alkaline magmatism; genesis of kimberlites and ultrapotassic rocks; experimental data for petrogenesis of [...]
